content.query:
select top 10 *
from openrowset(
    bulk 'https://demosynapselake.dfs.core.windows.net/users/jci/FactInternetSales.csv',
    format = 'csv',
    header_row = TRUE,
    parser_version = '2.0') as rows

-- Create database
create database jci

-- Create a Database Scoped Credential.
CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD= 'Ceor--4128';
CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL AppCred WITH IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity'

-- Create view
DROP VIEW IF EXISTS FactInternetSales
CREATE VIEW FactInternetSales AS
SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://demosynapselake.dfs.core.windows.net/users/jci/FactInternetSales.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [FactInternetSales]

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS DimProduct

CREATE VIEW DimProduct AS
SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://demosynapselake.dfs.core.windows.net/users/jci/DimProduct.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [DimProduct]

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS DimDate
CREATE VIEW DimDate AS
SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://demosynapselake.dfs.core.windows.net/users/jci/DimDate.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [DimDate]

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FactInternetSales
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DimProduct
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DimDate
